definitions: Học sâu
____ ________ is like an artificial brain with many, many layers.
You need a good GPU to train a ____ ________ model, or you'll be waiting for days!
It's called 'deep' because the network structure is, well, ____.
Đã thể hiện / Trưng bày
The new AI model _________ amazing skills in chess.
He _________ all the signs of being 'overwhelmed' by math.
Trí tuệ con người
AI is trying to mimic _____ ____________.
That was a stupid mistake... clearly not an example of _____ ____________!
Phát hiện bệnh tim từ hình ảnh
Using AI to ______ _____ _______ ____ ______ can save many lives.
Your model's job is to ______ _____ _______ ____ ______ just by looking at an X-ray.
Phương pháp / Cách tiếp cận
What ________ would you take to solve this data problem?
His ________ to learning ML is very 'hands-on'.
Đạt được
You need a solid plan to _______ your goal of $3k/month.
It's hard work, but you can _______ it.
(Thuộc về) Nhân tạo
__________ Intelligence is the main field you are studying.
This is not real sugar, it's an __________ sweetener.
Rút ra / Lấy được từ
We can ______ 'actionable insights' *from* this raw data.
He's trying to ______ a new formula.
Mang tính lý thuyết
That sounds good in a ___________ paper, but will it work in practice?
You need both ___________ knowledge and practical skills.
Mang tính học thuật
This book is very ________ and dry.
He spent his entire life in the ________ world.
Nghiên cứu
He works in the ________ and Development (R&D) department.
Doing ________ is like finding a needle in a haystack, but you built the haystack.
Một thuật ngữ khác
Is 'Data Mining' just _______ ____ for 'Analytics'?
'Overfit' is _______ ____ for 'your model memorized the test'.
Bao trùm / Bao hàm
Does the field of AI also _________ robotics?
Your study plan should _________ both English and ML.
Toàn bộ
He spent the ______ day debugging one line of code.
The ______ team was impressed by the model's accuracy.
Về cơ bản / Thực chất là
A neural network is, ___________, a very complicated math function.
He's ___________ saying that data is the new oil.
Đã chứng kiến
We have _________ a huge boom in AI in the last 10 years.
I _________ the model overfitting in real-time.
Dự đoán
The model tries to _______ the price of a house.
It's hard to _______ the future, but AI is trying.
Tiến hóa / Phát triển
The field of AI _______ so quickly, it's hard to keep up.
Your model _______ as it sees more data.
Sự ra đời (của...)
___ ______ of powerful GPUs changed Deep Learning forever.
Life was harder before ___ ______ of the internet.
Giành được lợi thế
Companies use data to ____ __ ____ over their competitors.
Learning ML will help you ____ __ ____ in the job market.
Dự báo (thường là chuỗi thời gian)
Weather ___________ is a classic data science problem.
We use this model for sales ___________.
Đã thu thập
We have ________ a massive amount of data.
All the students ________ in the lecture hall.
Thậm chí còn nhiều hơn
This model is ____ ____ accurate than the last one.
Learning ML is hard, but learning English at the same time is ____ ____ difficult.
Có lợi nhuận
Being an ML engineer can be a very __________ career.
They are looking for a __________ business idea.
Trong những năm 2000
Many of these ideas came from __ ___ _____, but the computers weren't fast enough.
He was born __ ___ _____.
Thuật ngữ hoa mỹ
'Deep Learning' used to be a _____ ____ for a neural network with many layers.
Don't be intimidated by a _____ ____; the concept is usually simple.
Tích lũy / Gom tụ
We are ____________ data at an insane rate.
Dust is ____________ on his unused textbooks.
Điên rồ
Training this model requires an ______ amount of data.
Your two-year plan is ambitious, bordering on ______!
Lịch sử mua hàng
Amazon recommends products based on your __________ _________.
Analyzing __________ _________ can reveal interesting patterns.
Lộn xộn / Bừa bộn
Real-world data is always _____, and you are the one who has to clean it.
My code becomes very _____ when I'm tired.
Ra đời / Hình thành
The term 'Artificial Intelligence' ____ ____ _________ in 1956.
This problem only ____ ____ _________ recently.
Từ đó / Nổi lên từ đó
We have a pile of raw data. We need to make sense ___ __ ____.
A new theory emerged ___ __ ____ research.
Kể từ đó
He learned his first line of code, and ____ _____ ____, he's been hooked.
The company launched its AI division in 2010 and has been growing ____ _____ ____.
Lãng phí
Having data and not using it is _______ a huge opportunity.
Stop _______ time on social media and go study!
To lớn / Khổng lồ
You need a _______ dataset to train a good Deep Learning model.
This is a _______ challenge, but you can do it.
Để tìm ra/hiểu ra vấn đề
An ML model is essentially a complex way __ ______ ______ ___.
Give me a minute, I'm trying __ ______ ______ ___.
(Thuộc về) Đồ họa
A GPU is a _________ Processing Unit.
This software has a nice _________ user interface (GUI).
Những tiến bộ
Recent ___________ in GPU technology have made Deep Learning possible.
He is excited about the latest ___________ in AI.
Bị dọa / Bị ngợp
Don't be ___________ by all the math; you can learn it step-by-step.
I was ___________ by the senior engineers at first.
Tổng quan ngắn gọn
The first lecture provides a _____ ________ of the entire course.
Can you give me a _____ ________ of your plan?
Vơ/Lấy dữ liệu
The first step is ________ ____ from the website using a scraper.
He's just ________ ____ from multiple databases.
Trừ khi
Your model won't work ______ you clean the data first.
Don't interrupt me ______ the building is on fire.
Chưa được sử dụng
A lot of data collected by companies sits ______ in a database.
He has a pile of ______ notebooks.
Vô dụng
Data without analysis is _______.
This old computer is completely _______.
Bị nhiễu (dữ liệu)
The sensor data was too _____ to be useful.
You must filter out the _____ data before training.
(Đang) Tiến hóa / Phát triển
This is a rapidly ________ field.
My model is constantly ________ as it gets new data.
Hầu như không / Vừa đủ
We have ______ enough data to train this model.
I was so tired I could ______ keep my eyes open.
Mới chỉ lướt qua bề mặt
This intro course only _________ ___ _______ of what ML can do.
We've only _________ ___ _______ of this problem.
Cũng vậy / Nữa
You need to learn math, and programming __ ____.
She works in ML, and her husband does __ ____.
Hãy tưởng tượng
_______ you could predict what a customer will buy next.
_______ being able to earn $3k remote! Keep working!
Trục (trong biểu đồ)
The X-____ represents time, and the Y-____ represents price.
You labeled the wrong ____.
Đại diện cho / Tượng trưng cho
Each dot on this chart ___________ a customer.
The color red often ___________ danger.
Ngang qua / Trên khắp
We found this pattern ______ all of our datasets.
This new rule applies ______ the entire company.
Có xu hướng
People who buy this book also ____ __ buy that book.
Models ____ __ overfit if you don't use regularization.
Quy luật / Mô thức
The goal of ML is to find a _______ in the data.
He noticed a strange _______ in the numbers.
Ngay lập tức / Ngay tắp lự
The model failed _____ ___ ___ ___ because the data was not clean.
I knew _____ ___ ___ ___ that this job was perfect for him.
Phức tạp
Deep Learning models can be very ___________.
The instructions were too ___________ to understand.
Sở thích / Sự ưu tiên
The model learns the user's music ___________.
Do you have any dietary ___________?
Rõ ràng là / Hiển nhiên
If you use bad data, your model will _________ be bad.
He _________ didn't read the manual.
Nói huyên thuyên / Nói nhảm
The professor was just ___________ __ about theory I didn't understand.
Stop ___________ __ and get to the point!
Lý thuyết
In ______, this should work. In practice, it explodes.
You need to understand the ______ behind the algorithm.
Viễn cảnh / Kịch bản
What is the worst-case ________?
Let's imagine a ________ where we have no data.
Thuê / Tuyển dụng
The goal of your 2-year plan is to get ____d.
They want to ____ an engineer with ML skills.
Có lẽ
_______ this approach is better.
_______ you should take a break.
Sự liên kết
The model found an ___________ between buying beer and buying diapers.
He works for a professional ___________ of engineers.
Sự trừng phạt
In Reinforcement Learning, the agent gets a reward or a __________.
Forgetting to save your code is its own __________.
Cuối cùng cũng nhận ra rằng
The model ___________ _______ ___ ____ 'A' is the best move.
After 2 years, you'll ___________ _______ ___ ____ it was all worth it.
Sự tiếp thu kỹ năng
Your 2-year plan is a period of intense _____ __________.
Language learning is a form of _____ __________.
Học theo thời gian thực
The algorithm adjusts its strategy 'in real time', which is ____-____ ________.
____-____ ________ is much harder than offline training.
Hoàn thành
What do you hope to __________ with this model?
You can __________ anything if you focus.
Rộng lớn / Bao quát
'Artificial Intelligence' is a very _____ term.
He has a _____ understanding of the topic.
Các khía cạnh
The course covers all _______ of ML.
This is one of the most difficult _______ of the job.
Các định nghĩa
You are asking me to create JSON ___________ for your words.
It's important to agree on the ___________ of the terms.
Có thể hoán đổi/dùng lẫn lộn
People often use the terms 'AI' and 'ML' ______________, but they are not the same.
These two words can be used ______________.
Vì mục đích / Vì lợi ích
___ ___ ____ of simplicity, let's assume the data is clean.
He's arguing just ___ ___ ____ of arguing.
Mang tính thực tế/Thực tiễn
Your plan to learn English and ML is very _________ for getting a job.
He gave me some good, _________ advice.
Các hướng dẫn
The 'recipe' for training a model is like a set of ____________.
Did you read the ____________ before running the code?
Chẳng hạn như / Như là
He's skilled in many areas, ____ __ Python and SQL.
We need to clean the data, ____ __ removing null values.
Một đống nguyên liệu thô (Ẩn dụ: Dữ liệu thô)
Your initial dataset is like _ ____ __ ___ ___________. You can't eat it yet.
You can't make a good meal from _ ____ __ ___ ___________ without cleaning them.
Mù tạt mật ong
_____ ________ is just an example of an 'ingredient' in the analogy.
This has nothing to do with ML, but _____ ________ is delicious.
Ướp gà (Ẩn dụ: Tiền xử lý dữ liệu)
Cleaning and scaling your data is like how you ______ _______ before cooking.
You must '______ _______' (preprocess data) first!
Làm nóng lò nướng (Ẩn dụ: Thiết lập môi trường)
Before you 'train', you must '_______ ___ ____' by importing libraries.
The recipe says to _______ ___ ____ to 200 degrees.
Ra lò / Đi ra
You put the data in, and a prediction will ____ ___.
The model '____ ___' of the oven (training) perfectly cooked.
Quá nóng
If your 'learning rate' is too high, the model's 'oven' is ___ ___ ___.
The oven was ___ ___ ___ and the chicken burned. My model failed.
Hơi gần / Suýt
That prediction was a ______ _____, but not quite right.
Don't stand a ______ ____ to the 'hot' GPU.
Các tổ hợp / Các kết hợp
The model tries millions of ____________ to find the best one.
We tried different ____________ of ingredients.
Tóm lại trong vỏ hạt dẻ (Nói ngắn gọn là...)
__ _ ________, ML is about finding patterns in data.
__ _ ________, your 2-year plan is awesome.
(Đang) So sánh
We are _________ the performance of two different models.
Stop _________ yourself to others.
Các thí nghiệm
Data Science is a lot of trial and error; you have to run many ___________.
Our ___________ showed that Model B was better.
Thông tin chi tiết có thể hành động
The boss doesn't want raw data, he wants __________ ________.
We found an __________ ________: customers who buy X also buy Y.
Nhiều kinh nghiệm thực chiến
To get hired, you need ______ __ _____-__ ___________, not just theory.
Your 2-year plan should include ______ __ _____-__ ___________.
Nói tóm lại
__ _____, the project was a success.
__ _____, you need to study more.
Đã hiểu rõ
He finally ____________ the complex algorithm.
Have you fully ____________ the task?
Bị ấn tượng
I was _________ by the model's accuracy.
Your future boss will be _________ by your dedication.
Chuẩn hóa
You should ___________ your features before feeding them into the model.
We need to ___________ the process so everyone does it the same way.
Các thông lệ / Quy trình (tốt)
Writing clean code is one of the 'best _________'.
What are the standard _________ for this company?
Một khung làm việc rõ ràng
CRISP-DM is a _____ _________ for data mining projects.
Following a _____ _________ helps you stay organized.
Không nên / Không phải là
This file ________ __ in this folder.
You ________ __ afraid of the math.
Bạn ở ngay đó / Chính nó đó
You've been looking for the bug, and _____ _____ ___ ___!
I was looking for my keys, and _____ _____ ___ ___.
Bị choáng ngợp
It's easy to feel ___________ when you see this giant list of words.
Don't get ___________; just learn one word at a time.
Quá khớp / Học vẹt
Your model is 100% on training data but 50% on test data? It's starting to _______.
Regularization is a technique to prevent a model from `_______`ting.
Thỉnh thoảng / Lâu lâu một lần
You should retrain your model _____ ____ __ _ _____, but not every day.
It's okay to take a break _____ ____ __ _ _____.
Tất cả các bài giảng
He binge-watched ___ ___ ________ in one weekend.
Did you understand ___ ___ ________?
Lặn sâu / Tìm hiểu kỹ
Today we will ____ ____ into how neural networks actually work.
Your plan requires you to ____ ____ into both English and ML.
Sống sót
If you can _______ this difficult course, you can do anything.
The company is struggling to _______.
